name: complimentarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that expresses praise or admiration for someone or something: I find it hard to speak complimentarily about my sisters. I did not intend to use that word complimentarily.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sales manager spoke very complimentarily about all the work her staff had done to win the award.The film has been complimentarily labelled as a classic of Latin American cinema.He said, not entirely complimentarily, that the sauce tasted like mustard.
